##Import the required
```{r ,message=FALSE}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")
```

```{r reorder}
reorder_highest = 
  instacart |> 
  filter(reordered==1) |> 
  group_by(department) |> 
  tally() |> 
  arrange(desc(n)) |> 
  head(40)

highest_reordered_plot = 
  reorder_highest |> 
  plot_ly(x = ~department, 
        y = ~n, 
        type = 'bar') |> 
  layout(title = "Most repurchased items",
         xaxis = list(title = "Department", automargin = TRUE),
         yaxis = list(title = "Times of reordered",
                      tickformat = ",g"))

highest_reordered_plot
```
